mapper.select:
select * from (select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rn, a.ifmmSeq, a.ifmmName, a.ifmmId, a.ifmmPassword, a.ifmmChildrenNum, a.ifmmDelNy from infrmember a, (select @rownum := 0) as rowcolumn where 1=1
AND a.ifmmDelNy = 1 AND a.ifmmDelNy = 0
AND a.ifmmName LIKE concat('%',#{shIfmmName},'%') = 1
AND a.ifmmId LIKE concat('%',#{shIfmmName},'%') = 1
AND a.ifmmId LIKE concat('%',#{shIfmmName},'%') OR a.ifmmName LIKE concat('%',#{shIfmmName},'%')
order by ifmmSeq ASC) as rownum_table where rn >= #{startPaging} and rn <= #{endPaging}
